attributes.action: Teach Secularism, Atheism, Agnosticism and Humanism in Schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Historical and religious values are not unimportant, but modern values are even more important.  In schools, modern values must be given equal or greater importance than historical or religious values.  It should be stressed that doing good make sense and that good behaviour does not need to be underpinned by fear of punishment either in this life or the next.
